item.title: @#$need help 508 coding commands!@
item.dc:creator: @wanbliscape wanbliscape
item.description:
@wanbliscape wrote:

Ive tried so many times to fix ::giveadmin and ::givemod and ::demote, but it just aint working, i compiled it with no errors, but when i do the command they don’t get it and i have to do it manually,

here is what i have(P.S can someone post the right way, i also want the command to be both for me which is hamster and for my co, own3r…

}
if (cmd[0].equals(“giveadmin”)) {
String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(“hamster”) + 1));
Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.disconnected[0] = false;
p2.rights = 2;
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, “You have been promoted to Administrator”);
p2.updateReq = true;
p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
}
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“givemod”)) {
String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(“hamster”) + 1));
Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.disconnected[0] = false;
p2.rights = 1;
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, “You have been promoted to Moderator”);
p2.updateReq = true;
p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
}
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“demote”)) {
String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(“hamster”) + 1));
Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.disconnected[0] = false;
p2.rights = 0;
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, “You have been Demoted”);
p2.updateReq = true;
p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;

PLEASE IF YOUR GOING TO LOCK IT FOR THE WRONG SECTION BECAUSE IDK IF THIS IS THE RIGHT SECTION PLEASE ANSWER FIRST, IVE TRIED AND LOOKED, CAN’T FIND NOTHING SO SOMEONE PLEASE HELP! ALSO THE 508 SOURCE IS ESPEON, OR SOMETHING LIKE THAT.!@#@

Read full topic
